name: When Physics don't exist
description:
You are a robot that has the power to choose which physics do and do not exist. Use this power to make your way through 6 puzzle levels.

Credits:

- All gameplay, levels, and *scripts: Lavalamp 202

- *The only exception is most of the player movement script, which I found online as a free asset with a few edits of my own: https://void1gaming.itch.io/basic-platformer-movement-script  

-Almost all of sprites were gotten from: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-robot-tileset 

- The notebook paper sprite was gotten from: https://www.maxpixel.net/Wired-Notebook-Notebook-Note-Notes-6360032 

- Finally, here are the sources for all of the audio:  [Music: https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/] [Zap: https://freesound.org/s/219622/] [Robot death: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/robot/]
